story.heading: Our Story
story.content: Founded in 2010, k Jewels began as a small studio dedicated to crafting unique, handmade pieces. Our founder, kapil singh, combined his passion for traditional craftsmanship with modern design sensibilities. Today, we continue to create jewelry that tells a story and celebrates life's precious moments.
